overview: Ari is a cool immortal who feels nothing, and Mike is an anxious young man who feels everything. The two meet on a bridge after Mike has decided to end his life. But Ari convinces him to stay alive for now, in order for Ari to help Mike appreciate life, while in return Mike help Ari finally die.
tagline: Help me live, and I'll help you die
title: Help Me Help You
